abstract.t: This proposal specifies a Kerberos (RFC 1510 [3]) change/set password protocol and a Kerberos change/set key protocol. The protocol consists of a single request and reply message. The request message includes both AP-REQ and KRB-PRIV submessages; the new password is contained in the KRB-PRIV submessage which is encrypted in the subsession key from the AP-REQ.
